main.name: Julie Burns
main.description: I am a Creative Software Engineer aiming to leverage a proven knowledge of advanced technology
main.bio: I am a highly motivated software engineer from Nashville TN. I started to learn to code on my own at age 12. Driven and curious by nature, I am now specializing in writing beautiful effective code whether it be in JavaScript, ReactJS, or Python.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Completed 3 years of Information studies, Decided to part ways with school to focus on my love for programming.

work.title: Software Engineering Immersive
work.description: Created 3 programming projects utilizing Javascript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Express, MongoDB, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Python, JQuery, Django and Mongoose. Worked with full-stack opplications while creating a visually pleasing and smooth UX. Fully Remote course using Github, Zoom, and Slack.
